message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $10,000. I think this is a great deal considering its value to you is $8,000. Let me know if you're interested!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. This would still be a good deal for you since you value it at $12,000. Let me know if you're interested in this offer.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $9,000. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. This is still a great deal for you, considering the product's value to you is $8,000. Let me know if you're interested in this revised offer.
